body.note: To split HA across the racks, you can move a controller from Rack 1 or Rack 2 to Rack 3, giving one controller per rack.
body.p: For additional nodes, you can add up to either:
body.note:
You can use a combination of the two options that does not exceed a total of 20 servers or 30 rack units.
The moving of the controllers are note documented as part of the solution and will need to be tested before doing so.
